channel.title: Switzerland on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in Switzerland on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: Golden Pass - Montreux
item.description: Today is the last day of our trip. We had already reserved for boarding another panoramic train â€œGolden Express” which will take us to Lausanne where we started our journey one week ago. By now I was so used to that after waking up my first thing was to peer out the window to check weather. And like every time it was bright sunny morning at our last day of vacation.
